question: Tī 2014 nî 12 goe̍h 28 ji̍t ê chûn-chāi kap 2016 nî 1 goe̍h 3 ji̍t ê chûn-chāi chit interval tiong, ài kāng-khuán ê kó͘-sū chò-hoé chhut-lâi ê sin kó͘-chi̍t thong-ki (bô kāng-khuán chū-iû chò-hoé--ê chhiúⁿ-koán chò-hoé ê chhan-khó) ūi-chāi toā-siâu?
Hiam-mih chi̍t kiā sū-kiāⁿ chōa-kiâⁿ siōng chē ê kò͘ tiâu kó͘?
answer: acquisition of kraft foods group inc .

question: Kènn-chiâⁿ tùi 2013-nî 12-ge̍h 29 hō ê khai-sí kiâⁿ-chūi kah 2016-nî 12-ge̍h 31 hō ê kiâⁿ-chūi, lâi-kènn-chiâⁿ chha-pia̍t chē-chē lâi-khì kim-ê kim-siu-chi̍h chha-pia̍t ê chha-pia̍t.
Tùi chit ê su-kì lâi kóng, àn-chóaⁿ-á chha̍h-chha̍h Kong-si ê chu-kim kó͘ ê oa̍h-tāng tī 2014 nî 12 goe̍h 28 ji̍t liáu-āu ê chhoán-chhoán chóaⁿ-iūⁿ?
answer: Tī 2014 nî 12 goe̍h 28 ji̍t liáu-āu, kong-si khai-sí chu-kim kó͘ ê oa̍h-tāng, chhiūⁿ chāi 2016 nî 1 goe̍h 3 ji̍t chìn-chêng ê sî-kan-lāi, 'chu-kim kó͘' ê hun-lūi sia̍p-ji̍p (-) ê sò͘-ba̍k. Chu-kim kó͘ ê chha̍h-chha̍h chiâⁿ-chòe lú-lâi lú tōa ê hū-sò͘, tùi -413 kàu 2016 nî 12 goe̍h 31 ji̍t ê -2471. Chit ê kóa chha̍h chhoán tō cheng-bîn kong-si sī chòe kin-á-lâng bái kó͘, he̍k-chiá sī chhoan-kau chu-kim kó͘ hō͘ oân-kang ê pôe-chêng kè-ōe, só͘-í kiám-chió chha̍h-chha̍h chu-kim kó͘ ê chóng-chha̍h.

question: Liệt kê chi ah sự kiện bē sī ū chhut sin kó͘ chi̍h chiah ū piàn-tōaⁿ tī chu-chhek kó͘ chi̍h ê chē.
answer: exercise of stock options issuance of other stock awards and other

question: 「收購 Kraft Foods Group Inc.」所發行嘅股票，佔 2016 年 12 月 31 號結餘總發行股票嘅百分比係幾多？
Ruo-si chham-chhiūⁿ cûn-chāi chòe-bâi ê iûⁿ-chènn chē chē--ê 20%, âⁿ-choaⁿ chòe-bâi ê '1 goe̍h 3 hō 2016 nî téng-chām' ê 'chhut-chènn-chènn' sī éng-chōaⁿ-chōaⁿ?
拍發股票嘅種類同埋拍發股票嘅數量有無明顯嘅關聯？請解釋你嘅答案。
answer: 係，好明顯有關聯。大型公司嘅動作，好似『收購卡夫食品集團有限公司』(發咗 592,898 股)同埋『向發起人發行普通股』(發咗 221,666 股)，所發行嘅股票數量，比平常嘅『行使股票期權』(由 178 至 4,555 股不等)大好多。呢樣顯示策略性交易比一般嘅員工福利措施，有更顯著嘅稀釋影響。

question: Tī si n kò háng-mu̍t ū bâ-hô͘-sûn ê sū-kè-lūi su-iàu kái-sû, chiàⁿ-chhiáⁿ kóng-kái sī siáⁿ-mih siáⁿ-mih?
answer: Ē 'chú-chāi kó͘' háng-mu̍t ū bâ-hô͘-sûn ê sū-kè-lūi. Tùi tē-it la̍k hāng chha̍h, i ū chha̍h-seng ê nî-tāi '2014', che sī hui-sò͘-jī bûn-jī, chha̍h chò sī pâi-tó ê siau-sit. Tùi siōng-bóe sì hāng chha̍h, i ū chha̍h siáⁿ-chòe kò͘-sǹg-hong-sek ê hū-sò͘ tùi-chhiò chha̍h '-413 ( 413 )', che su-iàu kái-sû chòe chi̍t-ê phiau-chún ê sò͘-jī-lūi ti̍t (-413).

question: Siaⁿ-chhò chiah-ê tòan-tâi hō͘ siaⁿ-chhò chhut-lâi ê sò͘-liōng chin tōa, chū-iû chiah-ê tòan-tâi chin tōa ê goân-in?
answer: ‘Kò͘-bái Kraft Foods Group Inc.’ sī chi̍t ê chin cheng-tâi. I hō͘ chhut-lâi 592,898 ê siaⁿ-chhò, pí tòa-chi̍t ê tòan-tâi (‘chhut-lâi chú-iàu kó͘-chha̍h hō͘ siā-tūi’ sī 221,666 ê siaⁿ-chhò) lóng khah tōa 2.6 pèi, piáⁿ chiah-ê tòan-tâi lóng khah tōa 28 pèi. I ê tōa-sè chhián chhut-lâi í khah chē chū-iû chē-chē chha-īⁿ ê sán-gia̍p oa̍t-tōng.

question: Kong-si tùi sóe-bú Kó͘-chú Kó͘-pè Kong-si (Kraft Foods Group Inc.) ê chioh-bé, ū chōa-súi ê kó͘-phiò hō͘ chhut?
